trans-unit.source: Alert when less than {%.0f^%1$,d} or more than {%.0f^%2$,d}
trans-unit.target: Alert when less than {%.0f^%1$,d} or more than {%.0f^%2$,d}

trans-unit.source: You can disable background scanning in Settings
trans-unit.target: You can disable background scanning in Settings

trans-unit.source: In order to measure relative humidity as accurately as possible, a sodium chloride (salt) calibration is recommended. See video tutorials on how to easily do this at home.
trans-unit.target: In order to measure relative humidity as accurately as possible, a sodium chloride (salt) calibration is recommended. See video tutorials on how to easily do this at home.

trans-unit.source: Note that calibration data will be stored locally in your mobile device. After Ruuvi Station uninstall and install, you may need to recalibrate.
trans-unit.target: Note that calibration data will be stored locally in your mobile device. After Ruuvi Station uninstall and install, you may need to recalibrate.

trans-unit.source: Charts feature works best with background scanning enabled.
trans-unit.target: Charts feature works best with background scanning enabled.

trans-unit.source: Would you like to enable background scanning?
trans-unit.target: Would you like to enable background scanning?

trans-unit.source: Clear the local historical data from the app?
trans-unit.target: Clear the local historical data from the app?

trans-unit.source: Use dashboard view to see multiple sensors at a glance. Restart the app after enabling it.
trans-unit.target: Use dashboard view to see multiple sensors at a glance. Restart the app after enabling it.

trans-unit.source: Ruuvi Station is an easy-to-use but powerful tool to supercharge your Ruuvi sensors. Simply add some sensors and you're ready to go.
trans-unit.target: Ruuvi Station is an easy-to-use but powerful tool to supercharge your Ruuvi sensors. Simply add some sensors and you're ready to go.

trans-unit.source:
Ruuvi's website: ruuvi.com
Ruuvi Forum: f.ruuvi.com
Ruuvi Blog: ruuvi.com/blog
Ruuvi on Twitter: twitter.com/ruuvicom
trans-unit.target:
Ruuvi's website: ruuvi.com
Ruuvi Forum: f.ruuvi.com
Ruuvi Blog: ruuvi.com/blog
Ruuvi on Twitter: twitter.com/ruuvicom

trans-unit.source: Just like Ruuvi sensors, Ruuvi Station is also open-source: github.com/ruuvi
trans-unit.target: Just like Ruuvi sensors, Ruuvi Station is also open-source: github.com/ruuvi

trans-unit.source: We've designed the app to be self-explanatory but comprehensive manuals are also available for both Ruuvi sensors and Ruuvi Station: ruuvi.com/support
trans-unit.target: We've designed the app to be self-explanatory but comprehensive manuals are also available for both Ruuvi sensors and Ruuvi Station: ruuvi.com/support

trans-unit.source: By using the application, you accept Ruuvi's standard terms and conditions: ruuvi.com/terms
trans-unit.target: By using the application, you accept Ruuvi's standard terms and conditions: ruuvi.com/terms

trans-unit.source: If you’re experiencing problems and our manuals didn’t provide the help you need, check out our many troubleshooting topics, here: ruuvi.com/support
trans-unit.target: If you’re experiencing problems and our manuals didn’t provide the help you need, check out our many troubleshooting topics, here: ruuvi.com/support

trans-unit.source:
In order to scan nearby Bluetooth devices in the background, Android requires background location access to be enabled. 

Please click 'allow all the time' if you'd like to use the background scanning feature. 

Ruuvi doesn't track your movements. You're safe.
trans-unit.target:
In order to scan nearby Bluetooth devices in the background, Android requires background location access to be enabled. 

Please click 'allow all the time' if you'd like to use the background scanning feature. 

Ruuvi doesn't track your movements. You're safe.

trans-unit.source: In order to scan nearby Bluetooth devices, Android requires location access to be enabled. \n\nRuuvi doesn't track your movements. You're safe.
trans-unit.target: In order to scan nearby Bluetooth devices, Android requires location access to be enabled. \n\nRuuvi doesn't track your movements. You're safe.

trans-unit.source: Please enable location permission in Settings to see sensors.
trans-unit.target: Please enable location permission in Settings to see sensors.

trans-unit.source: No sensors added,\npress here to add sensors
trans-unit.target: No sensors added,\npress here to add sensors

trans-unit.source: If you experience any issues with background scanning you should disable battery optimisation for Ruuvi Station. This procedure may vary depending on your device vendor, model and Android version.
trans-unit.target: If you experience any issues with background scanning you should disable battery optimisation for Ruuvi Station. This procedure may vary depending on your device vendor, model and Android version.

trans-unit.source: Go to Android Settings -> Apps -> Ruuvi Station -> Battery -> Battery Optimisation and select 'Don't optimise for Ruuvi Station'
trans-unit.target: Go to Android Settings -> Apps -> Ruuvi Station -> Battery -> Battery Optimisation and select 'Don't optimise for Ruuvi Station'

trans-unit.source: On Huawei devices go to Android Settings -> Apps -> Ruuvi Station -> Power usage details -> App launch. Disable 'Manage Automatically' and enable options: 'Auto-Launch', 'Secondary Launch' and 'Run in background'.
trans-unit.target: On Huawei devices go to Android Settings -> Apps -> Ruuvi Station -> Power usage details -> App launch. Disable 'Manage Automatically' and enable options: 'Auto-Launch', 'Secondary Launch' and 'Run in background'.

trans-unit.source: On Samsung devices go to Android Settings -> Battery -> App power saving detail and set option 'Turned off' for Ruuvi Station.
trans-unit.target: On Samsung devices go to Android Settings -> Battery -> App power saving detail and set option 'Turned off' for Ruuvi Station.

trans-unit.source: On Samsung devices go to Android Settings -> Device Maintenance (or Device Care) -> Battery. Disable 'Put unused apps to sleep'. Disable 'Auto-disable unused apps'. Remove Ruuvi Station from the list of sleeping apps. Disable background restrictions for Ruuvi Station.
trans-unit.target: On Samsung devices go to Android Settings -> Device Maintenance (or Device Care) -> Battery. Disable 'Put unused apps to sleep'. Disable 'Auto-disable unused apps'. Remove Ruuvi Station from the list of sleeping apps. Disable background restrictions for Ruuvi Station.

trans-unit.source: On Xiaomi devices go to Android Settings -> Apps -> Manage apps -> Ruuvi Station. Enable Autostart and set Battery Saver to 'No restrictions'.
trans-unit.target: On Xiaomi devices go to Android Settings -> Apps -> Manage apps -> Ruuvi Station. Enable Autostart and set Battery Saver to 'No restrictions'.

trans-unit.source: Continuous background scanning mode is enabled.\nData logging interval: %1$s
trans-unit.target: Continuous background scanning mode is enabled.\nData logging interval: %1$s

trans-unit.source: No background scanning mode is enabled
trans-unit.target: No background scanning mode is enabled

trans-unit.source: This feature enables background scanning, meaning that your phone will periodically search for beacons, even when you are not using it.
trans-unit.target: This feature enables background scanning, meaning that your phone will periodically search for beacons, even when you are not using it.

trans-unit.source: The app will periodically search for beacons using a service (with notifications), allowing for very frequent and reliable scanning, even when you are not using it.
trans-unit.target: The app will periodically search for beacons using a service (with notifications), allowing for very frequent and reliable scanning, even when you are not using it.

trans-unit.source: Define how often the background scanning will run
trans-unit.target: Define how often the background scanning will run

trans-unit.source: Enabling it may cause charts to update slowly
trans-unit.target: Enabling it may cause charts to update slowly

trans-unit.source: Configure interval between points shown on chart
trans-unit.target: Configure interval between points shown on chart

trans-unit.source: Small dots will help to understand when measurements were collected
trans-unit.target: Small dots will help to understand when measurements were collected

trans-unit.source: Set interval between points for chart from 1 to 60 minutes. Smaller values mean a more accurate chart, but also a higher performance requirement for your device
trans-unit.target: Set interval between points for chart from 1 to 60 minutes. Smaller values mean a more accurate chart, but also a higher performance requirement for your device

trans-unit.source: Configure the period of history to be shown on chart from 1 to 10 days
trans-unit.target: Configure the period of history to be shown on chart from 1 to 10 days

trans-unit.source: When you add a URL here, the app will execute an HTTP POST with the linked sensors when it does background scanning. \n\nFor more info, check the documentation.
trans-unit.target: When you add a URL here, the app will execute an HTTP POST with the linked sensors when it does background scanning. \n\nFor more info, check the documentation.

trans-unit.source: Choose the humidity unit you want to be displayed
trans-unit.target: Choose the humidity unit you want to be displayed

trans-unit.source: Choose the pressure unit you want to be displayed
trans-unit.target: Choose the pressure unit you want to be displayed

trans-unit.source: Choose the temperature unit you want to be displayed
trans-unit.target: Choose the temperature unit you want to be displayed

trans-unit.source: Download history data from the sensor?
trans-unit.target: Download history data from the sensor?

trans-unit.source: Sensor not found, is it in range?
trans-unit.target: Sensor not found, is it in range?

trans-unit.source: Do you want to remove the sensor? You can add it again later, if needed.
trans-unit.target: Do you want to remove the sensor? You can add it again later, if needed.

trans-unit.source: Swipe to see what Ruuvi Station can do for you
trans-unit.target: Swipe to see what Ruuvi Station can do for you

trans-unit.source: Measure environmental data: temperature, relative humidity and air pressure
trans-unit.target: Measure environmental data: temperature, relative humidity and air pressure

trans-unit.source: Access data for each linked sensor in real time and explore history graphs
trans-unit.target: Access data for each linked sensor in real time and explore history graphs

trans-unit.source: Set alerts and get notified whenever your limits are hit
trans-unit.target: Set alerts and get notified whenever your limits are hit

trans-unit.source: Let the app act as a gateway
trans-unit.target: Let the app act as a gateway

trans-unit.source: Press SCAN to find and add nearby sensors to your Ruuvi Station
trans-unit.target: Press SCAN to find and add nearby sensors to your Ruuvi Station

trans-unit.source: Nope, it did not work. Is the URL correct?
trans-unit.target: Nope, it did not work. Is the URL correct?

trans-unit.source: Nope, it did not work. Response code: %1$d
trans-unit.target: Nope, it did not work. Response code: %1$d

trans-unit.source: Timestamp,Temperature (%1$s), Humidity (%2$s), Pressure (%3$s),RSSI,Acceleration X,Acceleration Y,Acceleration Z,Voltage
trans-unit.target: Timestamp,Temperature (%1$s), Humidity (%2$s), Pressure (%3$s),RSSI,Acceleration X,Acceleration Y,Acceleration Z,Voltage

trans-unit.source: Timestamp,Temperature (%1$s), Humidity (%2$s), Pressure (%3$s),RSSI,Acceleration X,Acceleration Y,Acceleration Z,Voltage,Movement counter,Measurement sequence number
trans-unit.target: Timestamp,Temperature (%1$s), Humidity (%2$s), Pressure (%3$s),RSSI,Acceleration X,Acceleration Y,Acceleration Z,Voltage,Movement counter,Measurement sequence number

trans-unit.source: After signing in, you will automatically be marked as the owner of your nearby Ruuvi sensors. The claimed sensors will be restored after an app re-install.\n\nWith a Ruuvi Gateway router, you'll be able to monitor the claimed sensors remotely and share them with your friends.
trans-unit.target: After signing in, you will automatically be marked as the owner of your nearby Ruuvi sensors. The claimed sensors will be restored after an app re-install.\n\nWith a Ruuvi Gateway router, you'll be able to monitor the claimed sensors remotely and share them with your friends.

trans-unit.source: Benefits of the Ruuvi cloud service
trans-unit.target: Benefits of the Ruuvi cloud service

trans-unit.source: Check your email for an activation code.
trans-unit.target: Check your email for an activation code.

trans-unit.source: When you sign out, sensors the ownerships of which you've claimed on the sensor Settings page will be automatically removed from the app. When you sign in again using the same email address, the sensors will be returned from the cloud.\n\nDo you want to sign out?
trans-unit.target: When you sign out, sensors the ownerships of which you've claimed on the sensor Settings page will be automatically removed from the app. When you sign in again using the same email address, the sensors will be returned from the cloud.\n\nDo you want to sign out?

trans-unit.source: Synchronisation failed: need to log in first
trans-unit.target: Synchronisation failed: need to log in first

trans-unit.source:
You can share the sensor with friends and family if it's in range of a Ruuvi Gateway.

Receiver will be notified by email. If the receiver doesn't have a Ruuvi account, a free Ruuvi account will automatically be created at first log in.

Note that the sensor's custom name and background image will be shared. The name and image sync is one time only, and after this, they can be privately customised by the receiver. Offset values (if any) set by the owner, will be automatically synced, and the receiver will always see the final corrected values.
trans-unit.target:
You can share the sensor with friends and family if it's in range of a Ruuvi Gateway.

Receiver will be notified by email. If the receiver doesn't have a Ruuvi account, a free Ruuvi account will automatically be created at first log in.

Note that the sensor's custom name and background image will be shared. The name and image sync is one time only, and after this, they can be privately customised by the receiver. Offset values (if any) set by the owner, will be automatically synced, and the receiver will always see the final corrected values.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to unshare sensor for {%@^%1$s}?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to unshare sensor for {%@^%1$s}?

trans-unit.source: To enjoy all the features, create a free account or login to your existing Ruuvi account by entering your email address.
trans-unit.target: To enjoy all the features, create a free account or login to your existing Ruuvi account by entering your email address.

trans-unit.source: In order to share the sensor, you need to have a Ruuvi Gateway router nearby the sensor
trans-unit.target: In order to share the sensor, you need to have a Ruuvi Gateway router nearby the sensor

trans-unit.source:
In normal use, it's not necessary to adjust the offset.

If you're an advanced user and you'd like to manually configure the factory calibrated sensors, it's possible to do so.

Calibration tips are available on ruuvi.com/support
trans-unit.target:
In normal use, it's not necessary to adjust the offset.

If you're an advanced user and you'd like to manually configure the factory calibrated sensors, it's possible to do so.

Calibration tips are available on ruuvi.com/support

trans-unit.source: Enter the expected temperature value from sensor under current conditions ({%@^%1$s}):
trans-unit.target: Enter the expected temperature value from sensor under current conditions ({%@^%1$s}):

trans-unit.source: Enter the expected pressure value from sensor under current conditions ({%@^%1$s}):
trans-unit.target: Enter the expected pressure value from sensor under current conditions ({%@^%1$s}):

trans-unit.source: Enter the expected humidity value from sensor under current conditions ({%@^%1$s}):
trans-unit.target: Enter the expected humidity value from sensor under current conditions ({%@^%1$s}):

trans-unit.source: Only sensors within range of your Ruuvi Gateway can be shared. If you don't have one yet, get it on ruuvi.com/gateway
trans-unit.target: Only sensors within range of your Ruuvi Gateway can be shared. If you don't have one yet, get it on ruuvi.com/gateway

trans-unit.source: Your sensor doesn't report its current firmware version. This means that it's probably running an old firmware version and updating it is recommended
trans-unit.target: Your sensor doesn't report its current firmware version. This means that it's probably running an old firmware version and updating it is recommended

trans-unit.source: You are running the latest firmware version, no need to update
trans-unit.target: You are running the latest firmware version, no need to update

trans-unit.source: Downloading the latest firmware to be updated...
trans-unit.target: Downloading the latest firmware to be updated...

trans-unit.source: 1. Open the cover of your Ruuvi sensor
trans-unit.target: 1. Open the cover of your Ruuvi sensor

trans-unit.source: 2. Set the sensor to updating mode
trans-unit.target: 2. Set the sensor to updating mode

trans-unit.source: If your sensor has two buttons, press the R button while also pressing the B button
trans-unit.target: If your sensor has two buttons, press the R button while also pressing the B button

trans-unit.source: If your sensor has one button, keep the button pressed for ten seconds
trans-unit.target: If your sensor has one button, keep the button pressed for ten seconds

trans-unit.source: 3. When successfully completed you will see a continuous red light
trans-unit.target: 3. When successfully completed you will see a continuous red light

trans-unit.source: Do not close app or power off the sensor during the update.
trans-unit.target: Do not close app or power off the sensor during the update.

trans-unit.source:
Do you own this sensor? If yes, please claim ownership of the sensor and it'll be added to your Ruuvi account. Every Ruuvi sensor can have only one owner.

Benefits:

 ● Sensor names, background images, offsets and alert settings will be securely stored in the cloud

 ● Access sensors remotely over the Internet (requires a Ruuvi Gateway)

 ● Share sensors with friends and family (requires a Ruuvi Gateway)

 ● Browse up to 2 years of history on station.ruuvi.com (requires a Ruuvi Gateway)
trans-unit.target:
Do you own this sensor? If yes, please claim ownership of the sensor and it'll be added to your Ruuvi account. Every Ruuvi sensor can have only one owner.

Benefits:

 ● Sensor names, background images, offsets and alert settings will be securely stored in the cloud

 ● Access sensors remotely over the Internet (requires a Ruuvi Gateway)

 ● Share sensors with friends and family (requires a Ruuvi Gateway)

 ● Browse up to 2 years of history on station.ruuvi.com (requires a Ruuvi Gateway)

trans-unit.source: Ownership of the sensor claimed successfully
trans-unit.target: Ownership of the sensor claimed successfully

trans-unit.source: By removing the sensor, your sensor ownership status will be revoked. After removal, someone else can claim ownership of the sensor. Every Ruuvi sensor can have only one owner.
trans-unit.target: By removing the sensor, your sensor ownership status will be revoked. After removal, someone else can claim ownership of the sensor. Every Ruuvi sensor can have only one owner.

trans-unit.source: If you remove the sensor, the owner of the sensor will be notified and you cannot access the sensor anymore.
trans-unit.target: If you remove the sensor, the owner of the sensor will be notified and you cannot access the sensor anymore.

trans-unit.source: Your sensors will be in alphabetical order.
trans-unit.target: Your sensors will be in alphabetical order.
